name: Character Trajectories
description: Using a wide range of machine learning techniques, focusing on RNNs, GRUs, and LSTMs, implemented models to classify characters given the velocities of touch on a tablet. Also, predicted the next time step's velocities, generating smooth drawings. Utilized Matlab and Keras.

name: Analyzing Breast Cancer Data
description: Investigated the Breast Cancer dataset in the UCR repository to classify patients' cancers as malignant or benign. Achieved over 98% accuracy using Boostrapped Logistic Regression. Models were implemented using Python and SkLearn.
